content: The first official contest for the title of World Chess Champion (a 24-game match) took place in New York, Saint Louis, and New Orleans between Wilhelm Steinitz (the winner) and Johannes Zukertort, in 1886.
translations: ita:La prima gara ufficiale per il titolo di Campione del mondo di scacchi (un incontro da 24 partite) ebbe luogo a New York
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
